description: Wine red short-sleeved polo shirt in 100% pima cotton. A relaxed yet dressy look with its shirt collar and a slit hem. Made to your measurements.
Dark brown short-sleeved polo shirt in 100% pima cotton. A relaxed yet dressy look with its shirt collar and a slit hem. Made to your measurements.

Navy melange short-sleeved polo shirt in 100% pima cotton. This polo will give an incredibly soft feeling with a modern look. Dress down with a pair of chinos or up with a blazer for the ultimate stylish look. Made to your measurements.
Classic white short-sleeved polo shirt in 100% pima cotton. A relaxed yet dressy look with its shirt collar, chest pocket and a dovetail bottom cut. Made to your measurements.
Sky blue short-sleeved polo shirt in 100% pima cotton. A relaxed yet dressy look with its shirt collar, chest pocket and a dovetail bottom cut. Made to your measurements.
